title: Lunar Revel Pass is broken or the event page is wrong.
body: I lost an ARURF, I got nothing (was supposed to get 2 tokens). Next game, I win an ARURF, I got 2 tokens, where I should have gotten 4. So either the pass is stuck in some kind of delay, or else the new page telling how many tokens you get via ARURF is wrong.

replies.body: Missions as a whole are lagging behind. Sorry about that. Team is working to fix ASAP!

> [{quoted}](name=Mortdog,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=g3lrsQdH,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-01-28T19:57:57.566+0000)
>
> Missions as a whole are lagging behind. Sorry about that. Team is working to fix ASAP!

Does Riot ever plan on permanently fixing the crashing mission servers at the start of every event?

> [{quoted}](name=ChrisBrownze,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=g3lrsQdH,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2019-01-28T20:10:10.792+0000)
>
> Does Riot ever plan on permanently fixing the crashing mission servers at the start of every event?

Thats a no.

> [{quoted}](name=Mortdog,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=g3lrsQdH,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-01-28T19:57:57.566+0000)
>
> Missions as a whole are lagging behind. Sorry about that. Team is working to fix ASAP!

I know you're obviously trying your best but this missions lag happens everytime a new event launches, it's kind of frustrating.
ya games are not updating missions and we are not getting tokens from games wins or losses regardless of game type
yeah this just happened to me ..I have 178 tokens, lost 2 ARURF games and im still stuck at 178
I agree please fix this ive won four games and havent gotten my tokens....
I am also experiencing this issue. Please fix and grant tokens we deserve.
